name: Alice Q. Wong
body:
## Deja Vu
Deja Vu for iOS enhances your video experience to help you quickly find those memorable past times. We achieve this by accessing various voice/image/facial recognition services, ranging from REST-ful APIs to open-source libraries. Facebook friends' faces are machine recognized, their words captioned, and even simple objects identified to provide search terms. Think of it as a personal search engine for everything in your phone. ** This project is one of the top four finalist of Kaltura's VideoXHackathon and winner of the VoiceBase prize **

[video](http://challengepost.com/software/deja-vu) - [server source code](https://github.com/algobunny/djv)

## Bowls
Bill splitting app for Android. Inspired by Splitwise's Plates. This was my first "learn Android" project.

[![Get it on Google Play](http://valour.me/bowls/play.png)](https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=me.valour.bowls)

[source code](https://github.com/algobunny/Bowls) - [project log](http://valourai.tumblr.com/tagged/AndroidDev)

## Abstract Experiment Designer
Re-envision of PyView to be more flexible and multi-platform support.

[UI source code](https://github.com/algobunny/aed-web) - [SDK source code](https://github.com/algobunny/aedsdk)

## Shade Me with Words
A month by hand, 20 minutes in Photoshop, and 5 minutes on code. 

[demo](http://tux.valour.me/wordart) - [source code](https://github.com/algobunny/wordart)

## PyView
PyView is a framework for designing experiments protocols, developed for Stony Brook University's Neurology Department.

[source code](https://github.com/algobunny/PyView)

## The Spark still Tries
An experiment to test game play difficulty as it is increased within a single level.

[demo](http://www.tux.valour.me/spark/) - [source code](https://github.com/codebunny/Spark)

## Virtual Drawing Mannequin in WebGL
Lightweight virtual drawing mannequin.

[demo](http://tux.valour.me/vm) - [source code](https://github.com/codebunny/dollyweb)

## Virtual Drawing Mannequin in OpenGL
Lightweight virtual drawing mannequin.

[source code](https://github.com/codebunny/dollyc)
